channel.title: pebble on D00k
channel.description: Recent content in pebble on D00k

item.title: Time Twist Pop
item.description: Time Twist Pop is an simple, vibrant watchface design that aims to inject fun and colour into your day. With 9 different themes to choose from, you can easily switch up the look of the watchface to suit how you’re feeling. An ongoing project, Time Twist Pop is my first foray into working with C. Being a difficult language, especially for beginners, I intend to take my time to get it just right.

item.title: Rebble Weather Icons
item.description: The task Inspired by the Pebble revival project, Rebble and their unique aesthetic inspired by the original series of icons developed by Heydays design for pebble, I set out to make my own weather icons to use in projects on the watches in the future. While I took inspiration to make them familiar to users, I also sought to give them their own flair and personality. The original Pebble icons, designed by Heydays.
